name: Immortal-Paradise
description:
Immortal-Paradise
Game type: Action Game, RPG Game, Advanture Game.
It is a game about the future. Artificial Intelligent take care of all big city, the consciousness of human uploaded to the central supercomputer. The main characters come from the countryside, so they still get the bodies. Their job is to find a way to communicate with human consciousness in the big city. Figure out the truth - Are they really happy in the past centuries; Is the control computer a really "paradise" for the consciousness of the human being! If not , the left human will format and destroy the "Paradise". The left human will correct their civilization way. Players have to fight with different AI soldiers when they adventure in a different part of the city.

Feature: 工 shape fighting system, Each slash has its meaning. every slash could be identified by a horizontal slash(Yellow), lower slash(Blue) ,and vertical slash(Red). Each slash has its way to defence. The player can enjoy the dodge among blades and bullets.
